it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.model

Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.model.GameState

  • public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
    The GameState class is the key class of the "model" of the application, designed accordingly to the MVC pattern. It dialogs with the Game Controller and manages all the model changes and update, including players and map modifications, but is always the Game Controller to call its methods if and when it needs them
